text: [Music]
government education and nonprofit
organizations worldwide use Amazon Web
Services to address their unique
challenges requirements and missions we
listen to our customers
then innovate and deliver technology
that helps them solve problems faster
adapt to the environment deal with
changing sudden demand and maintain the
highest security standards the Amazon
Cloud is engineered for some of the
world's most security sensitive
organizations wherever you are in the
world or whatever your mission the cloud
can help you collaborate to solve
problems working with governments
venture capitalists startups professors
and researchers nonprofits and partners
[Music]
a global infrastructure offers customers
high availability strong resiliency and
the ability to meet compliance and data
residency requirements so public sector
customers can reduce costs drive
efficiencies and increase innovation no
matter where they are public sector
organizations have to move fast and do
more even when the budget is tight AWS
allows these organizations to be citizen
student and mission obsessed regional
and local governments are leading the
way and thinking big to take advantage
of the cloud to create a connected city
cities are innovating for and with
citizens delivering transportation
solutions for smart city projects
building healthier communities and
tackling justice and public safety data
needs educational institutions also need
to move fast to meet the ever-changing
needs of the modern student whether it's
facilitating teaching and learning in
the classroom or at a distance managing
university operations or accessing high
performance computing AWS has a solution
for example schools and universities can
easily build deploy and operate big data
solutions that support predictive
analytics krugman and retention efforts
personalize learning student engagement
and behavioral analysis the University
of Maryland University College improve
the performance of its analytics
platform by 20 fold and enabled its
engineers to focus on building new
applications instead of managing IT
infrastructure universities can reduce
wasteful infrastructure build-outs
conserve valuable campus real estate and
use only what they need to quickly and
affordably access computing storage and
application services anytime anywhere
across campus the AWS cloud helps
educational institutions focus on what
matters
their students and at AWS we are
committed to diversifying the technology
workforce and building the future of IT
through programs that reach out to women
and diverse communities and through our
AWS educate program designed to bring
more cloud computing resources to the
classroom public sector leaders want to
spend more time and resources on their
core missions not on routine IT
infrastructure with AWS organizations
can rapidly prototype trying several
architectures at once allowing them to
move more quickly to full deployment for
new programs and systems in addition
agencies can build public facing
websites quickly that can handle bursts
in traffic for mission-critical
workloads they can stop paying for
computing power they aren't using and
focus their resources on their important
work we work to drive missions forward
the AWS cloud accelerates missions so
organizations can focus on what matters
to them whether it's saving the world
curing cancer or keeping our citizens
safe every day more and more
organizations turn to the AWS cloud
